article.title: BAE Awarded Common Data Link Contract
article.author: George I. Seffers
article.text: BAE Systems, Electronic Systems Division, Wayne, N.J., is being awarded a $7,383,414 indefinite-delivery/indefinite-quantity contract for the acquisition of hardware, software, performance enhancements and maintenance of BAE Software Compliant Architecture Common Data Link family of products. The Naval Surface Warfare Center, Dahlgren, Va., is the contracting activity.
